name: Ms Melody Rhines
text: Voting at Dothan Civic Center was a great peaceful, and experience. Poll workers were efficient and polite. Our Civic Center is spacious and clean.

name: Paul a Stone jr
text: The civic  center  is where  l come to be what  we  refer  to as what  refereed as to be  as a home away from home.

name: David Gleissner
text: Sherry and I had a lovely time at The Nutcracker

name: Sarah Hodge
text: The building is nice, but the seats are horrible! Went to see the Nutcracker, the show was awesome, but was very uncomfortable in the kid seats they offer..two hours squeezed in with the little bitty arm stuck in my hip, I was on front row, so I finally moved to the bottom step of the floor to sit, found the hard floor to be more comfortable...BTW, the concession stand needs to clarify on there credit card only sign that it is a $5.00 minimum..but that was a minor issue compared to those horrible seats!

name: Cathy Solis
text: Nice little Civic Center. Very clean. The personnel were kind & helpful, the food is reasonably priced. It was great to watch The Wiregrass Wreckers Roller Derby team win!

name: Patricia Leach
text: Civic Center needs rails to hold onto in the balcony,  no help going up and down stairs,  anyone could fall very easily  !

name: Amanda lynn
text: Ive only been to one event.everyone was helpful and i enjoyed myself
